text: Connor Idun (born 29 July 2000) is an Australian rules footballer who plays for the Greater Western Sydney in the Australian Football League (AFL). He was born in England and has an Australian mother and an African father. Connor played all his junior football with the Drysdale Football Club on the Bellarine Peninsula, as well as representative football with Geelong Falcons in the NAB Cup. He was selected at pick #61 in the 2018 national draft. He made his senior debut against Sydney in round 20 of the 2019 season. ==References== ==External links== * *Connor Idun from AFL Tables Category:Greater Western Sydney Giants players Category:Geelong Falcons players Category:2000 births Category:Living people Category:Australian rules footballers from Victoria (Australia)
title: Connor Idun
